name: OnlineAirHockey
description:
This game is an online multiplayer air hockey game where you try to shoot on the opponents net.

This game does require a second computer and a friend to play with you. There is know way to join a room without some one all ready telling you the room code.

This game is part of a school project me and a friend did in a Game Development class.

WARNING. This game has many bugs and may not run properly, this game may or may not be updated and get bug fixes. If you find bugs please report them in the comments.

Thanks hope you enjoy player are game.
